Description:
LOOKING FOR A GREAT PROJECT
This is an ideal home for someone with the renovation bug. This property has loads of potential to either invest or even create a beautiful home. Situated in the lovely beach community of Coronet Bay this home is on approximately 500sqm featuring 3 bedrooms, open plane living and spectacular bay views. Undercover parking, garden shed and leafy yard you will need to bring your vision and apply your creativity and you can make something amazing.

Address: 40 Bass Horizon Promenade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
ONE FOR ALL BUYERS – GREAT INVESTMENT
A prized position offering all the advantages of living in Coronet Bay, this well maintained brick veneer home offers 3 bedrooms, large BIR’s, open plan living area, with kitchen overlooking the family meals area.
Great size bathroom, spacious laundry, an outdoor entertaining area great for entertaining family and friends all year round.
A large double garage, good size back yard, there is more than enough space for the kids or pets to frolic and enjoy the beach life style Coronet Bay has to offer.
With so much at your fingertips, Bass Coast vine yards, only minutes from popular Coronet Bay swimming beach. 20 Minutes to the world famous GP track, Penguin parade and much more, including a great life style. This could suite as the Ideal permanent home for the whole family or beach holiday home - Or investment opportunity in the holiday rental space. Which is one of the main reasons this property is ideal for any home owner.
Call exclusive listing agents Tamara & Daniel today.

Description:
14 GREENWICH GRANGE TRADITIONAL TIMELESS BEAUTY
Beautifully presented cottage, this beautiful home is set in a very quiet section of Coronet Bay. If you have been looking for a home that offers beach style living or just need a weekender or somewhere to retreat to from the hustle & bustle of everyday life you will not find better than this timeless beauty. In one of Coronet Bay’s most sought after streets, 600 meters walking distance to the beach and the General Store and walking tracks.
Beautifully presented - Bright & comfortable, neat & tidy, Plenty of living space & generous bedrooms x3 master has a split system and two of the bedrooms have BIR, powder room, great size main bathroom and laundry, kitchen new gas stove new range hood, dish washer, there are new blinds and drapes throughout the home. New carpet throughout the home, Split system heating and cooling. The home has been freshly painted throughout as well as the exterior, there are 12 solar panels. The home also offers a great sun room with a warm and inviting east facing veranda that holds a spot for a comfy chair for the morning sunshine in the summer and the afternoon warmth in the winter. There is a large double lock up garage and a high roofed carport so plenty of room for a large boat and caravan. For the gardeners there are fruit trees, roses and native plants and 2,250 litre water tank, this property is extremely peaceful and private.
Contact Tamara & Daniel for an inspection

Description:
NEAR SANDY SWIMMING BEACH ON CORNER BLOCK !!!
This 3 bedroom weatherboard home has plenty of charm and potential as just needs handyman to do some exterior works. Features charming front verandah, separate lounge, good size kitchen/meals area, older style bathroom and floor boards in hallway. This property is situated on attractive corner block with 2 road access. Plenty of room for boat/caravan and also to build big shed. Walking distance to beach and coastal scenic walks. With some TLC this property will make a great weekender or rental investment or first home buyers. Currently tenanted on month to month basis to longstanding tenant for $225 per week. Local primary school, kindergarten, doctor, cafes, chemist, wineries and tourist attractions approx.. 7 mins.
Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Description:
Coronet Bay - Semaphore Beach House
This beautifully renovated 4 bedroom/2 bathroom double storey home is a delight to inspect only minutes from the Coronet Bay foreshore. Perfectly landscaped gardens with native and contemporary plants welcome you into the open-plan heart of this home. Gleaming modern kitchen offers quality appliances along with ample storage. Easy care polished floor boards throughout, 2 separate living areas, 3 decking areas with views, great high clearance car/boat or caravan accommodation and a lock up single garage. 2 x split system air-conditioners plus a solid wood heater keep this home so comfortable. This home is a popular holiday home and would make a beautiful permanent home as well. There is nothing to do here except move in and put your feet up. This home has a new Heat Pump hot water service and down-lights through out. Don't let this one slip by!

Address: 92 Champ Elysees Esplanade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
Position Perfect Beach Views & 200m to water, 3 Bedrooms + Study, open plan spacious Home
A wonderful opportunity to a purchase a home just 200 metres from a safe swimming beach and a permanent all year round dog beach, plus walking trails.
Relax on the large 3m X 7.5m deck and enjoy the sound of the waves and a view of the sea.
Two story modern 5 year old house still under builders warranty on a 500m2 block,
3 bedrooms all with built in wardrobes, master bedroom with ensuite and large walk in wardrobe.
Family bathroom with shower and separate bath. Laundry and 2nd toilet. Home office or 4th bedroom.
Open plan living, dining with a fantastic kitchen with brand name electric cooktop/oven and dishwasher, huge amount of storage, pull out pot draws.
Second living area which can be zoned off.
Polished timber flooring throughout, carpeted bedrooms, tiled kitchen and wet areas
Large double garage with remote entry, large work bench, access to house via garage.
Two reverse cycle brand name air-conditioners, ceiling fans, efficient heat pump electric HWS, ducted vacuum. Steel garden shed 6m X 3m with concrete floor & power.
Brand new fencing, fully enclosed yard, low maintenance gardens with a 2700L water tank. Separate fenced driveway with gates, ideal for boat parking.
Corinella boat ramp 7 minutes drive.
7 minutes to Cafes, Bakery, Chemist and Doctor
20 minutes from Phillip Island
45 minutes Cranbourne
90 minutes Melbourne CBD
Viewing by appointment or see open day times

Address: 40 Cutty Sark Rd Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
ESCAPE TO A SPACIOUS HOME BY THE BEACH
Get ready for the summer and lazy days at the beach or fishing in the quiet seaside town of Coronet Bay, only 500m to the safe sandy swimming beach, general store and BBQ area. This large 4 bedrooms home has loads of space for a family or 2 and has had some renovations done, including a new roof, new hot water service, painted inside and out, new wood coonara heater, new split system heater/cooler, new dishwasher etc. There is a very large living area with wood heating, ceiling fans and reverse cycle air conditioning. The kitchen has loads of cupboards, dish washer and gas oven. The bedrooms all have built in robes with a walk in robe and full ensuite to the master. The main bathroom is spacious and has a bath. A perfect combination for 2 families, holiday letting or even a B & B. Outside is a lovely front and rear deck, double garage with power, large garden shed and pad for a boat and even room for a caravan. All set behind a high private fence. Secure your home and move in before Christmas. The owners will consider a long settlement if you require.

Description:
4 bedroom home is a lot larger inside that it looks!
Open the door when you inspect this home and you will be pleasantly surprised by the huge amount of space inside with 3 living rooms, 4 bedrooms , 2 bathrooms and 3 toilets! The family room and lounge both have timber floors (hard wood polished floors throughout home except for wet areas) plus the lounge has a wood heater making it very cosy for winter! The kitchen has electric cooking and has adjoining living/dining area with door to outside. This would be a wonderful place to build a deck for out door entertaining. The main bedroom has a walk in robe and ensuite, 3 other bedrooms don't have BIR's but has freestanding cupboards that will remain with property. Family bathroom with bath and shower. A 3rd toilet has a hand basin. Garden and wood shed plus a carport that could fit 1 large car and 2 small cars. This home would suit a family on a budget that is happy to improve the property in their time frame. Across road from farmland.

Description:
BOTH COASTAL AND RURAL !!!!
Spacious home located within walking distance to safe sandy swimming beach and has rural outlook opposite. Featuring -
* Open plan living area
* Split-system airconditioner
* Meals area with sliding door to side yard
* Renovated kitchen with soft closing drawers, pantry, gas stove
* 3 good size bedrooms all with wwc - master with ensuite
* Family bathroom with separate shower and bath
* Tiled floors for easy maintenance
* Verandah along front
* Expansive concrete driveway which will accommodate 5 cars ideal for washing down boats/caravans
* Good size garage with 3metre height roller door
* Separate fenced area for boat/caravan
* Garden shed
* Fenced off backyard
This property is ideal for permanent or rental investment. Only minutes to local shops, cafes, wineries, primary school and kindergarten. Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Address: 41 CUTTY SARK ROAD Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
BAY VIEWS FROM YOUR HOLIDAY HOME BY THE BEACH
With stunning bay views and only a short walk to the safe and sandy swimming beach at Coronet Bay make this a perfect home for you to use or continue to holiday let for currently $240 per night. Furnishings can stay to make the set up easy. There are three bedrooms, open plan living with wood heater and reverse cycle air conditioner, new kitchen and bathroom upstairs and an amazing view from the deck. Downstairs has been fitted out as a second living area, large bathroom with toilet and a laundry with an attached workshop/storage area or develop further for more bedrooms. Set behind secure gates. A shortage of properties on the market means this one won't last long so get in before the summer rush.

Description:
IDEAL LOCATION WITH BAY VIEWS
Ideally positioned and within walking distance to a safe sandy swimming beach and nearby park is this spacious 2 storey family home.
Featuring 4 bedrooms, all with BIRs and WWC, master with ensuite and ceiling fan, modern family bathroom and separate toilet. The spacious open plan kitchen, dining and lounge room has a Coonara wood heater, split system air conditioner, ceiling fan and polished timbers floors.
Upstairs is a generous second living area or guest room with ceiling fan and WWC. Sliding doors lead out onto a large undercover deck with views of the bay.
Complete with a double garage and double carport providing ample room for a caravan or boat, established low maintenance garden and is fully fenced.
Within close proximity to local shops, cafes and services. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Four bedroom, 2 storey splendor. Walk to the beach
Excellent opportunity here to acquire this lovely 4 bedroom home complete with many extras such as ensuite to master, large lounge and dining, separate family/meals area, lovely well appointed kitchen with walk in pantry and plenty of bench space, evaporative cooling, coonara plus heaps of other inclusions.
Outside you can catch the Summer Bay breeze from balcony area which is perfect for those family BBQs or enjoying a cool drink. There is ample storage underneath the home which includes a workshop ideal for the handyman.
All this plus more within easy walking distance to the Sandy Beach of Coronet Bay. Priced to sell, be quick.

Description:
OUTSTANDING 3 ACRE FARMLET
A must see is this well cared for property is a true credit to the current owners, all the hard work has been done leaving a stunning home on 3 manicures acres (approx). The home has been lovingly restored from top to bottom with a new roof and gutters, new cladding, new windows, concrete stumps, fully rewired and 18 new solar panels. Inside the home you will discover a massive rumpus room complete with pizza oven, powder room and even a second kitchen for entertaining. The main part of the home has new flooring, a new stunning country kitchen with vinyl wrap cabinets, pull out double pantries, dishwasher and 900ml stainless steel oven, the living area has a new split system air conditioner and new wood heater with an impressive slate backdrop. There are three good sized bedrooms with built in robes and a large main bathroom. With room for a horse or two, ducks, chooks etc, there is a dam in the large rear paddock, chicken pens with their own water tank, lots of sheds, fruit trees including grape vines, olive trees, apricot, apple, pear, quince, pomegranate and a vegie garden. Country comfort at it's best in a very convenient location only 2 kilometers to the beach, 4 kilometers to launch your boat and a short walk to the service station, bakery etc. Only seven minutes to Phillip Island, 30 minutes to Wonthaggi, 40 minutes to Pakenham. Inspection by appointment.

Description:
DOUBLE BRICK HOME CLOSE TO BEACH !!
This is a great opportunity to enjoy a beach side lifestyle within walking distance to a safe sandy swimming beach or potential for income either from permanent rental/holiday investment.
The home itself offers 3 large bedrooms , ceiling fans, spacious living area with woodheater, modern kitchen with electric cooktop and dishwasher, good size family bathroom, large entrance and tiled floors throughout for easy maintenance.
Outdoor boasts plenty of space for cars with single and double garage with
concreted floors, back verandah with rural outlook, sunblinds, outside
shower great to clean off from after the beach, concreted driveway and the backyard is fenced.
Walk to playground, bbq area and shop. Enjoy strolling the beach and or
just taking in the beautiful sunsets in this peaceful location. Phillip
Island and major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins and CBD easy commute with dual lane highway.
